parameters.param:
#!/bin/sh CLOUD_IMAGE_ID='%CLOUD_IMAGE_ID%' echo 'CLOUD_IMAGE_ID from parameters: '${CLOUD_IMAGE_ID} if ! test "$CLOUD_IMAGE_ID"; then DEPLOY_SETTINGS="$CONFIG_DIR/deploy-settings.yaml" FOLDER_ID="$(cat $DEPLOY_SETTINGS | yq -r .FOLDER_ID)" CLOUD_ID="$(cat $DEPLOY_SETTINGS | yq -r .CLOUD_ID)" source "/etc/cloud-builder/common.sh" create_yc_profile
IMAGE_URL=`/usr/local/bin/aws s3 \ --region ru-central1 \ --endpoint-url=https://storage.yandexcloud.net \ presign %dep.DataLens_BuildVMImages_BuildBIUploads.env.S3_PATH% \ --expires-in 10800`
IMAGE_NAME=`echo $IMAGE_URL | tr "/" "\n" | tail -n 1 | tr "?" "\n" | tail -n 2 | head -n 1`-`date +%s%N`
echo "IMAGE_NAME: $IMAGE_NAME" echo "IMAGE_URL: $IMAGE_URL"
IMAGE_INFO=`yc compute image create \ --folder-id=b1gmdgpr40q4nokkqo8s \ --family=g4-images \ --name="$IMAGE_NAME" \ --description="imported from s3" \ --source-uri="$IMAGE_URL" \ --format json`
CLOUD_IMAGE_ID=`echo $IMAGE_INFO | jq -r .id` echo "CLOUD_IMAGE_ID: $CLOUD_IMAGE_ID"
fi
echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='CLOUD_IMAGE_ID' value='${CLOUD_IMAGE_ID}']"

#!/bin/sh set -eo pipefail
echo "Cloud image id is '%CLOUD_IMAGE_ID%'"
echo "Create service account key file from environment variable" NEW_KEY_FILE=$(pwd)/key.json echo $YC_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY_FILE > $NEW_KEY_FILE
PROFILE_NAME=sa-console-prod
echo "Creating profile..." yc config profile create $PROFILE_NAME yc config set cloud-id $CLOUD_ID yc config set folder-id $FOLDER_ID yc config set endpoint $YC_ENDPOINT yc config set service-account-key $NEW_KEY_FILE
/bin/bash deploy.sh "$INSTANCE_GROUP_ID" "%CLOUD_IMAGE_ID%" "$DEK" ../projects/cloud-console/preprod
